Author: lotsofsqs
Text: Slips are not the same as relapsing, but I'd take them as seriously.  You're looking for a way to cope with the stress. He's not going to resent you for that. He will care way more about the lying though. For all he knows, you're having second thoughts.    >I do need to lose weight for the wedding.   Sorry, but your mental health is way more important (insert shrugging guy).  I'd try to do some research on other coping mechanisms and figure out what works for you.
